---
title: "Table cross referencing"
format: html
---
```{r}
#| label: mytable
#| tbl-cap: "My wonderful table"

mtcars |> head() |> knitr::kable()
```

See @mytable will not work

*However*

```{r}
#| label: tbl-mytable
#| tbl-cap: "My wonderful table"

mtcars |> head() |> knitr::kable()

```

See @tbl-mytable works
